mapper.select: select shop_no as shopNo, shop_name as shopName, organize_id as organizeId, bg_img as bgImg, entry_name as entryName, as_hold_days as asHoldDays, cs_contact as csContact, cs_phone_number as csPhoneNumber, cs_weixin_no as csWeixinNo, status as status, operate_status as operateStatus, unix_timestamp(created_time) as createdTime from mall_shop where shop_no=#{shopNo}

select shop_no as shopNo, shop_name as shopName, organize_id as organizeId, bg_img as bgImg, entry_name as entryName, as_hold_days as asHoldDays, cs_contact as csContact, cs_phone_number as csPhoneNumber, cs_weixin_no as csWeixinNo, status as status, operate_status as operateStatus, unix_timestamp(created_time) as createdTime from mall_shop where organize_id in
#{organizeId}

SELECT ms.id,ms.shop_no,ms.shop_name FROM organize_group og LEFT JOIN organize_rel ol ON ol.group_organize_id = og.id LEFT JOIN mall_shop ms ON ol.organize_id = ms.organize_id WHERE 1=1 AND ol.status = 2 AND og.organize_id = #{organizeId} AND ms.id is not null

SELECT ms.id,ms.shop_no,ms.shop_name FROM mall_item_organize mio LEFT JOIN mall_shop ms ON mio.shop_no = ms.shop_no WHERE 1=1 AND mio.organize_item_no = #{itemNo} AND mio.is_copy = 0 AND ms.id is not null
